channel.title: Pking with clans
channel.description: I never really been into clans, I only been in one and that was in rsc 2004. I have not chosen to join any even though I still remember that clans name. Now I find close to 0 appeal to pk on my 40 1 99, since castle pking is dead and the only way to pk is in level 3 and down against a bunch of noobs and my lack of def doesn't allow for me to deep wild pk. So my question to you guys is if you guys enjoy clan pking? also where would I find a clan? I looked the other day over a tip.it and that place seems dead.

item.title: Pking with clans
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

I know but my pure is only lvl 70 lol, so we can’t really pk together even we wanted to.

Read full topic
